com.paypal.selion.utils.process

Interface ProcessHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UnixProcessHandler, WindowsProcessHandler

    public interface ProcessHandler
    This interface represents the capabilities that any custom process handler would need to possess if it is to be used for the auto healing logic of SeLion.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void killProcess(List<ProcessInfo> processes) 
      List<ProcessInfo> potentialProcessToBeKilled() 

    • Method Detail

      • potentialProcessToBeKilled

        List<ProcessInfo> potentialProcessToBeKilled()
                                             throws ProcessHandlerException
        Returns:
        A List of ProcessInfo that represents the bunch of processes that need to be forcibly killed before a given node can be recycled.
        Throws:
        ProcessHandlerException

      • killProcess

        void killProcess(List<ProcessInfo> processes)
                 throws ProcessHandlerException
        Parameters:
        processes - A List of ProcessInfo that are to be forcibly killed.
        Throws:
        ProcessHandlerException
